    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quiet Allies](/Feats.aspx?ID=5202) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You’re skilled at moving with a group. When you are Avoiding Notice and your allies Follow the Expert, you and those allies can roll a single Stealth check, using the lowest modifier, instead of rolling separately. This doesn’t apply for initiative rolls.
name: Quiet Allies
